name: Girls Memory Card
description:
Classic game "Find a Couple" in the style of pixel art with a great visual range that will brighten up your day and bring pleasure to your eyes, more than 30 levels and a dozen half-naked girls are waiting for you!

Girls Memory Card - game "find a pair" with dozens of levels and beautiful pictures, solve pairs, enjoy the pictures on the cards, and if you manage to pass the level you will be rewarded with a picture of an interesting character!

Feature of game:
- Increasing Complexity
- Beautiful Visual style
- Music
- Puzzles
- 31 levels
